languages.text: "Ты не радеешь за справедливую участь себе подобным, мон-кай. А желаешь, чтобы право судить и казнить было лишь у тебя и таких, как ты. Палачей".

traits.locale_text: "Ты не радеешь за справедливую участь себе подобным, мон-кай. А желаешь, чтобы право судить и казнить было лишь у тебя и таких как ты. Палачей".

languages.text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."
languages.original_text: "Ты не радеешь за справедливую участь себе подобным, мон-кай. А желаешь, чтобы право судить и казнить было лишь у тебя и таких, как ты. Палачей".

traits.locale_text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."
"It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."
"It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."
"It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."
"It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."
"It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."

languages.text: 「お前が気にかけているのは、同胞にとって正当な運命などではない、モン＝ケイ。お前が望んでいるのは、裁く権利がただお前と、お前の仲間たちだけに属することだ。処刑人どもが」
languages.original_text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が気にかけているのは、同胞にとって正当な運命などではない、モン＝ケイ。お前が望んでいるのは、裁く権利がただお前と、お前の仲間たちだけに属することだ。処刑人どもが」

languages.text: "Ihr seid nicht an einem gerechten Schicksal für Euer Volk interessiert, Chem-Pan-Sey. Nein, Ihr hättet nur gerne, dass das Recht, zu richten und zu verdammen allein bei Euch und Euresgleichen liegt. Henker."
languages.original_text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nicht an einem gerechten Schicksal für Euer Volk interessiert, Chem-Pan-Sey. Nein, Ihr hättet nur gerne, dass das Recht, zu richten und zu verdammen allein bei Euch und Euresgleichen liegt. Henker."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas un sort juste que vous souhaitez pour vos semblables, mon-keigh. Non, vous désirez simplement que le droit de juger et de condamner appartienne uniquement à vous et aux autres bourreaux. »
languages.original_text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas un sort juste que vous souhaitez pour vos semblables, mon-keigh. Non, vous désirez simplement que le droit de juger et de condamner appartienne uniquement à vous et aux autres bourreaux. »

languages.text: «No es un destino justo para tu especie lo que te preocupa, mon-keigh. No, tan solo deseas que el derecho a juzgar y condenar os corresponda en exclusividad a ti y a los tuyos. Sois verdugos».
languages.original_text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."

traits.locale_text: «No es un destino justo para tu especie lo que te preocupa, mon-keigh. No, tan solo deseas que el derecho a juzgar y condenar os corresponda en exclusividad a ti y a los tuyos. Sois verdugos».

languages.text: “你并不在乎你的族人是否能得到公正的命运，猴子。不，你只希望审判、惩罚的权力永远属于你和像你这样的人，属于你们这些刽子手。”
languages.original_text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."

traits.locale_text: “你并不在乎你的族人是否能得到公正的命运，猴子。不，你只希望审判、惩罚的权力永远属于你和像你这样的人，属于你们这些刽子手。”

languages.text: "Senin gibilerin derdi kahpe felekle değil mon-keigh. Yargılama ve cezalandırma hakkı bir tek sizin elinizde olsun, başka şey istemezsiniz. Cellat değil misiniz, hepiniz aynısınız."
languages.original_text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."

languages.original_text: "It is not a just fate for your kindred that concerns you, mon-keigh. No, you only wish that the right to judge and condemn belonged solely to you and those like you. Executioners."
